mapper.insert:
insert into task_script_config_record
task_script_config_record.file,
task_script_config_record.version, task_script_config_record.action
values
#{file},
#{version}, #{action}
mapper.select:
select task_script_config_record.id, task_script_config_record.file, task_script_config_record.version, task_script_config_record.action form task_script_config_record
task_script_config_record.id = #{id}
